Leslie Koh, Associate Financial Services Manager at Prudential Assurance Company SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered 3d agoYou should consider paying in CPF first. Using cash to pay off your loan is not a good idea as your home is an illiquid asset, hard to convert back to cash when you need it urgently in times of need like medical emergencies or loss of job.Consider putting your money in other areas, like investments or bonds or even high-interest savings account.0 comments3
